includedAssets.title: Jack Reacher
includedAssets.synopsis: Tom Cruise stars as an elusive and brutal investigator who uses strong-arm tactics to catch a multiple murderer. Action with Rosamund Pike.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Fierce action with Tom Cruise as the brutal investigator who bends the rules to catch a murderer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Tom Cruise stars as an elusive and brutal investigator who uses strong-arm tactics to catch a multiple murderer. Action with Rosamund Pike.

includedAssets.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
includedAssets.synopsis: Tom Cruise returns to action as author Lee Child's roaming vigilante Jack Reacher in a story that sees him dragged into a military conspiracy with a new-found ally. When the commander of his old military unit, Major Susan Turner (Cobie Smulders), is arrested on trumped up spy charges, it's time for Reacher to go to work. But his mission to take down the bad guys is complicated when they target a teenage girl (Danika Yarosh) who might just be his daughter. Cruise's Last Samurai director Edward Zwick calls the shots, kicks and punches on a thriller that's as ruthlessly effective as its hero.

includedAssets.title: Jack Reacher 2 Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Tom Cruise is the unstoppable investigator Jack Reacher in this high-octane action double-bill. Werner Herzog, David Oyelowo, Rosamund Pike, Robert Duvall and Cobie Smulders also star. Based on Lee Child's series of novels.

includedIn.title: Jack Reacher
